opinion.posture: Indictment charging defendant with robbery and aggravated assault. Before FIOK, J. Verdict of guilty of simple assault and judgment of sentence entered. Defendant appealed. Appeal, No. 390, April T., 1975, from Court of Common Pleas, Criminal Division, of Allegheny County, Sept. T., 1974, No. 5287A. Submitted November 18, 1975.
opinion.attorneys: Ralph J. Cappy, Public Defender, for appellant; Robert L. Eberhardt, Assistant District Attorney, and John J. Hickton, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
